title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set.
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, and then a new table group is created, the group dialog is not shown. However, the user should be able to go and define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
EB: The group dialog is not shown when attempting to create a new table group without setting the dataset. The expected behavior is that the group dialog should be displayed regardless of whether the dataset is defined or not.
